text:
Hello all, 
My company is looking into possibly changing RMM products. The current RMM
product that we have has a lot of great features. The problem is that those
features don't always work as intended and we are finding ourselves having to
manually go in and remediate a lot of issues. 
My question for the group is what RMM solution does your company use and how is
it on a day to day basis? Is it automated, easy to use, integrates well with
your other company applications and products, easy to troubleshoot, able to
deploy patches to endpoints remotely? 
Kind regards, 
Joseph Lugo 
Junior Technical Engineer 
[https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/hs0VxnrKJhyKgA-I8LBP2WMRU-lpMEGxRl45Gds0fqZsfpU7c-oIcbgR9ioOQKNVVSh4DixN06em0ogpNGPEyt9tUl9Lew2FhLo_85ShAxAXj2wRF2hR5zDkriqoE0U3M52GlT32TsVgS6DwNma4480]
 
Pole Star Space Applications USA, Inc 
450 8th Ave SE, St. Petersburg, FL 33701 
Direct: +1 727 610 9521 
Office: +1 727 610 9501 
Email:  
www.polestardefense.com
 
[https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/sEjqNyugMSe8W8wCnnJ9RA2FW_yP9CDPBIcS2LQxhELcverEYiAFbMFtUNxLZa_tQk5s42N_Ih8v27284wB-mUQumT2XLOXk1WFCvpoG2kiOrzfFmUOq3easyfpw7qs-zQocpYSrW7xuGDOqDqp17MI]
[https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/Wrr8sX1qq0c9wyf1yLjFE1jugkBnRh5qb7owHHonJMGPyrz3ILcRxRCfI7qIjmu9IUljSLvy5sq76F0jaXGcZlqFHlbptDr1I5XZzV4FjwYVoThUGHv8b3GowCMYQMF9nOv5QrXrrREvBQQrA3M95-I]
[https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/v35sVb7GUstiwQIk81RzZ2Vc1FTdq-0e3TOPx2FjWszV16YBT307ylt2qKcGjbpUn7j8CI2p-SWUZ6FnMiQKiNJ8ziGyDi0BhnhjVxV4NsbwCPh1Nk7ACjNJ9qwvV70CVyA1LPyXYlct4i7jKeVUtPQ]
 
The Pole Star group of companies.
